title: L'ecume des Jours = the Froth of Time
abstract: Note: Adapted from the novel by Boris Vian.
description: Colin, a rich and sentimental young man loves Chloe. His friend Chick shares his passion for literature and neglects his girlfriend Alise. Nicolas, driver and cook, is watching over this peaceful 'world'. Colin's life would be perfect, if only Chloe was not suffering from a mysterious disease.  Credits: Producers, Andre Michelin, Philippe Senne ; director, Charles Belmont ; writers, Charles belmont, Philippe Dumarcay, Pierre Pelegri ; photography, Jean-Jacques Rochut ; music, Andre Hodeir. Cast: Jacques Perrin, Marie-France Pisier, Sami Frey, Alexandra Stewart, Annie Buron, Delphine Seyrig.
